scripts.stop: ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 stop "simple superhero service" --silent && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 delete "simple superhero service" --silent
scripts.tests: npm run test:postman && npm run test:unit && npm run test:cors:valid && npm run test:cors:invalid
scripts.test:cors:valid: NODE_ENV=cors-valid npm run start && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run && npm run stop
scripts.test:cors:invalid: NODE_ENV=cors-invalid npm run start && ./node_modules/.bin/cypress run && npm run stop
scripts.test:postman: npm run start && ./node_modules/.bin/newman run tests/tests/simple_super_hero_service.postman_collection.json --environment tests/tests/test.postman_environment.json --insecure && npm run stop
